p: In Brazil, cumulative (mean coefficient: 0.04, 95% CrI: 0.01–0.08, Fig. 3a) and biweekly (mean coefficient: 0.11, 95% CrI: 0.04–0.17, Fig. 3a) chikungunya incidence were positively associated with expected dengue transmission in the following biweek (Fig. 3a, c, Supplementary Fig. 7). No significant association were found between chikungunya incidence and dengue transmission potential in Colombia.
